snippet.title: Kitsu Saga - Official Trailer (Aeria Games)
snippet.description:
Visit http://kitsusaga.aeriagames.com for more information.

"An ancient evil has awoken and war looms on the horizon. Two great nations, once bitter enemies, must unite to stave off the approaching darkness. Rise to the challenge and make your mark on the world."

Kitsu Saga melds gorgeous cel-shaded anime inspired visuals and traditional western MMORPG gameplay to create an engrossing online experience for thousands of players. KS offers players a thrilling adventure across a vast landsacpe, through numerous villages and towns; countless quests, challenging dungeons and world bosses, a deep pet-based crafting system, and a range of character customization options including character ages that affected your skill bonuses.
